summary: A pytest suite that validates the IPA‑based grapheme‑to‑phoneme conversion component used in text‑to‑speech, checking that it correctly supports different locales, handles case variations, manages out‑of‑vocabulary tokens, normalizes Unicode input, and applies symbol replacement rules.
business_intent: Guarantee the accuracy and robustness of the speech synthesis pipeline by automatically testing the G2P model across linguistic edge cases, thereby reducing defects and improving product quality for multilingual TTS applications.
